radiographic_examinations.findings: Left hydronephrosis and deviation of the left lower ureter with a suggestion of early dilatation on the right side
Irregular contour of the bladder with some elevation of the bladder base
Asymptomatic with normal blood urea nitrogen and creatinine
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: At followup 7 years postoperatively, the patient showed improvement in upper tracts, no recurrent disease
